title: Ark of Osiris Registration
content: Ark of Osiris Registration Hello Governors! Please register for the upcoming Ark of Osiris match. Sign up with your in-game name below. Let's aim for victory!

title: Kingdom-wide Buff Notice
content: Kingdom Buff Activated! TRAINING BUFF IS NOW ACTIVE For the next 8 hours, all troop training speed is increased by 10%. Utilize this opportunity to strengthen your armies!

title: Alliance Fortress Build
content: URGENT: Alliance Fortress We are building a new Fortress in [Coordinates]. All members are required to send builders to assist. Your contribution is crucial for our territory expansion.

title: Pre-KvK Rally Cry
content: FOR THE KINGDOM! War is upon us. Prepare your troops, check your equipment, and be ready for the fight of your lives. No mercy, no retreat.

title: Barbarian Fort Rally
content: Barbarian Fort Rally Starting rallies on Barbarian Forts near the flag. Join up!
